searches.description: Generate a list of all VM across Azure Subs
searches.kql: Resources | where type =~ 'Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines' | project id, name, location, resourceGroup, properties.storageProfile.osDisk.osType | order by id desc

searches.description: Dump all assets in a specific resource group
searches.kql: Resources | where (resourceGroup == ('<@resourcegroup@>')) | project name,id,type,location,subscriptionId,resourceGroup,tags, managedBy, sku,plan,properties,identity,tenantId | order by name | summarize count() by type
